thread.section_title: The Beaumont - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing hotel with superb service
thread.title_full: Amazing hotel with superb service - Review of The Beaumont, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Cindy H
title: Amazing hotel with superb service
text: I can't say enough nice things about this fabulous hotel. We felt so cared for in every way during our stay. The service was impeccable. Rooms are beautiful with every amenity - and wonderful art deco decor. The beds were incredibly comfortable with luxurious ultra soft bedding. We met friends for drinks in the cub bar, for hotel guests only- which was divine. Felt like a secret club room. Great spa as well. Had one of the best massages in my life by Chantal. The location is unbeatable -in the heart of Mayfair. We've stayed at some of the best hotels in London and around the world - but this is now our new favorite.
